creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
Created a publication based on the default publication using the New Publication
feature in 1.4. This new publication still uses
lenya-1.4.x/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/pubs/default/work/cache/live/index.html for
the index page, even though the publication name is not default.

Created attachment 18857
Uses context:/ to get the right cache dir

Added context:/lenya/pubs/{page-envelope:publication-id}/ before references to
{global:cache-dir}. Not sure if this is the best way of fixing the issue.
However, it does work for templated publication as well as the original
publication.
